sect2.title: Re-installation of Binutils

note.para: It's worth pointing out that the Binutils test suite we run in this section is considered not as important as the one we run in Chapter 6.

sect2.para: Create a separate build directory again:
Now prepare Binutils to be compiled:
Before starting to build Binutils, remember to unset any environment variables that override the default optimization flags.
Test the results (nothing should fail here):
Now prepare Binutils for the re-adjusting of the toolchain in the next chapter:

screen.userinput: make -C ld clean make -C ld LIB_PATH=/usr/lib:/lib

caution.para: Do not yet remove the Binutils source and build directories. We'll need these directories again in the next chapter in the state they are in now.
